org.haldean.chopper.server
Class ImageReceiver

java.lang.Object
  org.haldean.chopper.server.ImageReceiver
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ImageReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

A thread to receive an image from an ObjectInputStream and send that image to an ImageComponent

Author:
William Brown, Benjamin Bardin

Constructor Summary

          Create a new ImageReceiver thread
 
Method Summary
 void run()
          Start the image receipt

Constructor Detail

ImageReceiver

public ImageReceiver(java.io.ObjectInputStream _in,
                     java.lang.String _header,
                     ImagePanel _imageComp,
                     Callback _callback)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Create a new ImageReceiver thread

Parameters:
_in - The ObjectInputStream to read the image from
_header - The incoming image message containing the length and capture time
_imageComp - The ImageComponent to send the image to after receipt
_callback - The callback to call once the image has been received
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the supplied header is not a valid image receipt

Start the image receipt
